about_the_game:
LAST LINE VR


LL|VR allows you to play 3 Game Mode which are Survivor Stories, Endless Horde and Home Defense Modes. Each map offer unique atmosphere and challenges. With mines and turrets you can create your own defense system or buy better weapons for the increase your firepower. But you must be careful! In story mod there will be some unique special events and also not all enemies are the same. Some of them faster, stronger and tougher. If you want to survive you must act wisely. No matter what, you have to Hold the Line!

CHALLENGE MODE

  • Challenge Mode prepared to give you best experience with unexpected events and cinematic scenes.
  • Challenges gives you up to 2 hours unique challenge to defend your base.
  • You will play with 3 different survivors.
  • Mode has 3 maps: City-Forest-Farm. Each map has day/night times.
  • Yes, this is still a horde mode; but feels more like a mini story-mode.
  • Addition: A mini-story which locating in space ship.

HOME DEFENSE MODE

  • You will try to keep the zombies out the house.
  • With progress of game, you will able to access other rooms of house. New rooms mean new weapons.
  • You can also spend your points on using some skills.
  • Experimental, will support future weekly updates.

ENDLESS HORDE MODE

  • Game has 2 maps for endless mode which are much different against Story-Mode or Home-Defense maps.
  • The game gives you access to all the firepower, but with all kinds of threats.
  • To reach next wave, you must be careful about spending your points. Aim well, thing fast.
  • Addition: New map in space theme. New enemies, new defense systems, new weapons.

LAST LINE VR


LL|VR allows you to play 3 Game Mode which are Survivor Stories, Endless Horde and Home Defense Modes. Each map offer unique atmosphere and challenges. With mines and turrets you can create your own defense system or buy better weapons for the increase your firepower. But you must be careful! In story mod there will be some unique special events and also not all enemies are the same. Some of them faster, stronger and tougher. If you want to survive you must act wisely. No matter what, you have to Hold the Line!

  • Challenges gives you up to 2 hours unique challenge to defend your base.

name: Last Line VR: A Zombie Defense Game

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Last Line VR: A Zombie Defense Game - $6.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Last Line VR: A Zombie Defense Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC. Standing Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Last Line VR is a WWII based VR zombie defense shooting game that has unique events and story. Witness the struggles and stories of the survivors or stay alive as long as you can against unlimited hordes with Endless Mode | Home Defense Mode
